title: I know someone who's boosted (Long passage, no name shown)
body: I have a friend who went from Silver to Plat in 1 season, yea i know thats not even!! Poeple do that all the time!! But i have eveidence to prove it, but don't know if it's enough, i've played with him a few games and only won 1, and that was because i went 16/7/14. Here it goes. He has over 100K on Vayne being his highest mastery champion, so its aafe to asume he mains Vayne right? I mean why invest so much time in 1 champ right? Well, it's been over 2 months and he has only played 4 games of Vayne, lost 2, won 2, has a kda of 1.10;1, 39% kill partipation. The whole of season 6, he played 21 games of Vayne and has a 23% win rate, He has more games on Darius, Morde and Lucian over 60%. It's been over 3 months since he last played Darius and Morde and 1 month since he played Lucian. The last game he played ranked was 2 weeks ago, he played 4 and lost 4 with a kda of 1.12;1. The games he played were against Silver player and for a "Plat ADC" main to lose to Silvers is just embarresing, 4 in a row as well. As i said, his last ranked game was 2 weeks ago and he has been playing norms, he has a 40% win rate overall and he plays against silvers. You may say "team mates blah blah blah" No, he doesnt even go postive. He has a kda of 1.13;1 AGAINST SILVERS. After reading this, could you pls put your conclusion in the polls below? Thanks

replies.body: I played with you before lol, anyways it's not about who cares, it's just not right, if you know or seen something and you know it's not right, it's gonna be at the back of your head, it's like knowing someone is cheating in a test or competition and they achieved good even though you know they didn't deserve it, it's gonna annoy you, especially if the guy brags like he got it legitimately
Doesn't matter if he is boosted as ranked will reset in a few days, and if he is not good enough for plat, he won't get it again.
he will, he can just boost again

For the whole of season 6, all he did was elo camp (I wonder why) the champs he plays in ranked, he no longer plays them, in fact his top played champs are rarely seen played, its like he doesnt know how to play them.

i wouldn't wanna have a friend like you lol.. sounds like you jelly. playing vs lower elo ppl than what you are n do bad, doesn't mean you're shit lol just means u don't give a damn. Having fun is why you play with lower elo ppl.

I would agree with that statement....if it were true, I've plyed with him multiple times and it seems like he is so deffensive about his elo, always talking shit about how he's the only Plat in there even tho he is 6/13 as Rengar Mid. The first time I met him I was playing against him in a Riven mirror match and I won 5/3, Granted I'm a Riven one trick, so lets just say bad game. Someone in game type "TFW a Plat Riven loses mirror lanes xd" and he started ranting about his elo, saying that "for a silver, you talk too much shit to Plats" he ended the game with 5/9 and i ended with 12/6. Point is, why would someone get so defensive and worked up over something they dont need to prove since players can just check his profile?
